name: Providing Residents with Cell Phone Coverage
requirements: Each unit on the grid represents 1 mile
Cell towers need to be at least 1 mile away from each house.
overview:
Government officials are figuring out where to build cell towers to provide cellular coverage to residents. How many cell towers should they build and where? 

Details:

  1. Each unit on the grid represents 1 mile
  2. Cell towers need to be at least 1 mile away from each house.
  3. Houses within 4 miles of each cell tower can receive cell coverage

PREDICTION.solutionPromptHelper: Click a coordinate to place a cell tower.

FIRST_PROPOSAL.instructions: Thanks for sharing your initial thoughts! As a next step, review some of the skills that might help you improve on your initial proposal. When you're ready, submit your first proposal (You can still edit later).

MODIFY_PROPOSAL.instructions: Your peers and members of the community have also submitted proposals. Review them and provide feedback. They might also give you ideas for how to improve your own proposal.

FINAL_SOLUTION.instructions: Thanks for submitting your final proposal! You can continue providing feedback to your peers.
